name: show_hardware_design1
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(SIM PC Cabinet Configuration,Hardware Design Selection - Sim PC Node,Node Supplier (Sim PC)1,Rack Mounting Type for SIM PC Node,Additional Hard Disk (Sim PC Cab),Optional DVD (Sim PC Cab),Ent_sim_cab_tpm,Sim PC Cluster1)*>
[IF]([IN](<*VALUE(Interface with TPS Required?)*>,Yes,No,)){<*SETOPTIONAL(Additional Memory (Sim PC Cab))*><*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional Memory (Sim PC Cab))*>}{<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional Memory (Sim PC Cab))*><*SETREQUIRED(Additional Memory (Sim PC Cab))*>}[ENDIF]
<*xDisallowallValuesExcept(Sim PC Cluster1:<* LIST ( SELECT AttValue FROM ClusterAttValues WHERE CAST (AttValueCode AS float) <= '<*CTX( Container(List of Locations/Clusters/Network Groups).Rows.GetCount )*>' ) *>)*>
